summary: A letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to Ghislaine Maxwell at MDC Brooklyn, providing the password for a disc containing discovery materials related to her criminal case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The recipient of the letter, an inmate at MDC Brooklyn, involved in criminal case 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed the letter.

locations: MDC Brooklyn Metropolitan Detention Center, P.O. Box 329002, Brooklyn, NY 11232
The Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office sent a password for a disc containing discovery materials to Ghislaine Maxwell on October 4, 2021.
The document is related to the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
Ghislaine Maxwell was incarcerated at MDC Brooklyn under registration number 02879-509 at the time.
